Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is truly a testament to quality and innovation, and I believe it holds immense potential to enrich your life or business in numerous ways. Given its unique features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at a special price of $200. This opportunity not only secures your access to top-tier quality but also supports our commitment to providing unparalleled customer service. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
